instructions.title: Excel Usage Instructions:
instructions.step1: Click "Download Excel Template" to get an Excel file with the correct format
instructions.step2: Fill in the data in Excel file (name, description, price, and quantity are required, discount percentage is optional)
instructions.step3: Save the file and click "Upload Excel File" to import the data
instructions.step4: After importing, you can upload images for each product from the interface
